properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Nedu ne naa rakshakuni naa madilo cherchukonnaanu Samaadaana santoshamu anubavinchiti nenu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
v2
v3
v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Mikkili shramalo nemmadikalige naashana gotilonundilepi Nee veepuvenuka naa papamulu paaravesitivi veevu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
